messages.subject: Re: Good for Kelly! and what a bunch of crap, anyway (small rant)  was: a wish for my grandchildren
messages.msgSnippet: You know, if the people who send this child oppressing, disrepecting crap around EVER got an e-mail said we wished their children could grow up respected and
messages.messageBody:
You know, if the people who send this child oppressing, disrepecting crap
around EVER got an e-mail said we wished their children could grow up
respected and free from the fear of assault and punishment and free from
the oppression of traditional parenting, and societies rigid confinement
of children etc., they would be HOWLING about the insulting nature of
such an e-mail and whining about how parenting is a hard job and how
parents deserve respect and blah, blah, blah...

Yes, I yelled.

Nice job, Kelly. That's all I really meant to say. <g>

Deb L
